entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogwarts students often visit Hogsmeade on weekends, and Harry is planning to go there next time. ("Next time he was in Hogsmeade...")

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has been helping Harry, and Harry wants to buy him socks. ("he was going to buy Dobby a pair of socks...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, and he has just finished his exams. ("he had got through...he didn't have to worry about anything now until June the twenty-fourth.")

relationships.description: Harry has been helped by Dobby, and now he wants to repay him by buying him socks. ("he was going to buy Dobby a pair of socks...")
Harry is planning to visit Hogsmeade next time. ("Next time he was in Hogsmeade...")
